managewiki-desc: Allows management of wiki settings, extensions, namespaces and permissions
managewiki-link-extensions-desc: Enable or disable extensions for this wiki
managewiki-extensions-text: Enable or disable MediaWiki extensions for this wiki.
managewiki-namespaces-text: Create and configure custom namespaces for this wiki.
managewiki-settings-text: Configure various settings for this wiki.
managewiki-permissions-text: Configure user groups and their permissions for this wiki.
